attributes.action: Use tax incentives and pressure local councils to stagger school starting times and buisness operating hours - to help reduce congestion and CO2 emissions. Use tax incentives to ecourage company's to allow working at home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bus lanes, traffic calming, congestiosn charges - Most of this would not be needed if the local schools could stagger their times, and buisnesses had an incentive to let people work from home.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
